title: Is A Wrinkle in Time a good book? - Quora

response.answer_text: Heck yeah. I read A Wrinkle In Time a few weeks ago and thoroughly enjoyed it. It if you are into science fiction I definitely recommend it, but it doesn’t matter that much, you don’t have to be a science fiction fan to appreciate A Wrinkle In Time. It’s relatively short so you won’t waste much time if you don’t like it, I think you should give it a go.
